formatDescription: The Digital Negative (DNG) specification describes a non-proprietary file format for storing camera raw files that can be used by a wide range of hardware and software vendors. DNG is an extension of the TIFF format, and is compatible with the TIFF-EP standard. This version was published in May 2023.
provenanceCompoundName: Brigham Young University / Brigham Young University
formatProvenance: 04/2024 (v.118)- Signature modified to identify 1.7.0 and 1.7.1 versions. Submitted by Brigham Young University.
